data.text: Hiob toaa so se,
“Mʼani agyina asram a atwa mu no,
bere a ne kanea hyerɛn mʼatifi
Ao, nna a misii so no,
bere a na Otumfo no da so ka me ho
bere a na nufusu mu srade afɔw mʼakwan
“Bere a na mekɔ kuropɔn pon ano
mmerante hu me a, wogyina nkyɛn
atitiriw gyae kasa
mmapɔmma tɛm dinn,
Wɔn a wɔte me nka nyinaa ka me ho asɛmpa,
efisɛ meboaa ahiafo a wosu pɛɛ mmoa,
Onipa a na ɔrewu no hyiraa me;
Mede trenee furaa sɛ mʼadurade;
Meyɛɛ aniwa maa anifuraefo,
Meyɛɛ ahiafo agya;
Mibubuu amumɔyɛfo se
“Medwenee sɛ, ‘Mewu wɔ mʼankasa me fi mu,
Me ntin beduu nsu ano,
Mʼanuonyam rempa da,
“Nnipa hwehwɛɛ sɛ wotie me,
Sɛ mekasa wie a wɔnnkasa bio,
Wɔtwɛn me sɛnea wɔtwɛn osu a ɛpete,
Sɛ meserew mekyerɛ wɔn a, wɔntaa nnye nni;
Mebɔɔ kwan maa wɔn na metenaa ase sɛ wɔn hene;
